name: Hecko The Dolphin
description:
Made during Train Jam 2017!

Hecko the Dolphin is a dolphin from hell with a gatling gun that decided to destroy the ocean and all life in it.

Think Ecco meets Nuclear Throne... sort of.

Control Hecko's jump with A (or Space) - hold to move down, release to spring up and out of the water! Hold down X or RT (either CTRL or LMB) to fire your gun. After a certain distance traveled, you'll receive a random power up - unexpected anticipation, the theme of the jam!

By Tyler Haddad, Rejon Taylor-Foster, and Anthony Bockley. Special thanks to Becker College and Mass DiGI for their sponsorship for the Student Ambassador program for Train Jam.
